member.summary: List of types that allow serializer to use a type not explicitly defined. Primarily used to define ISerialier Of IMyType, but pass in object of MyType (serializer blows up on now knowing that MyType exists, only knows about IMyType)

member.name: P:Genesys.Extras.Serialization.JsonSerializer`1.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a DateTimeFormat that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying dates and times. Default is ISO 8601 DateTime Format. Does not default to microsoft Date()

member.name: P:Genesys.Extras.Serialization.JsonSerializer`1.EmitTypeInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets the data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.

member.name: M:Genesys.Extras.Serialization.JsonSerializer`1.Serialize(`0)
member.summary: Serializes and returns the JSON as a string

member.name: M:Genesys.Extras.Serialization.JsonSerializer`1.Serialize``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes the passed object to a string

member.name: M:Genesys.Extras.Serialization.JsonSerializer`1.Deserialize``1(System.String)
member.summary: De-serializes the passed string to an object
